overview: Jin-hyeok, a civil servant who has to run to an emergency call for wildfires even on a warm spring day, and training location manager, who goes hunting in Geoje to catch a new drama without giving in to the back of a broadcaster. The two of them were irritable by the proposals to meet, but when the appointment for the Geoje location did not go as expected, Jin-hyeok's pink scandal spreads around Geoje because of Yeon-su, who sold his opponent Jin-hyeok and found a place with difficulty...
title: Mongdol Scandal
